name: ipmn
description: Intraductal papillary mucinous neoplasm (IPMN) is a type of cystic lesion of the pancreas that is characterized by the presence of mucin-producing cells within the pancreatic ductal system.

elements.name: Presence
elements.definition: Presence of IPMN in the pancreas.

values.name: Present
values.definition: IPMN is present in the pancreas.

values.name: Absent
values.definition: IPMN is not present in the pancreas.

values.name: New suspected
values.definition: There is a new suspected IPMN.

values.name: Main duct
values.definition: IPMN is located in the main pancreatic duct.

values.name: Branch duct
values.definition: IPMN is located in a branch pancreatic duct.

values.name: Mixed
values.definition: IPMN is located in both main duct and branch ducts.

elements.name: Communication with Pancreatic Duct
elements.definition: Presence of communication between the IPMN and the pancreatic duct.

values.name: Present
values.definition: There is communication between the IPMN and the pancreatic duct.

values.name: Absent
values.definition: There is no communication between the IPMN and the pancreatic duct.

elements.name: Location in Pancreas
elements.definition: Location of the IPMN within the pancreas.

values.name: Uncinate
values.definition: IPMN is located in the uncinate process of the pancreas.

values.name: Head
values.definition: IPMN is located in the head of the pancreas.

values.name: Body
values.definition: IPMN is located in the body of the pancreas.

values.name: Tail
values.definition: IPMN is located in the tail of the pancreas.

elements.name: Size
elements.definition: Size of the IPMN in millimeters.

elements.name: Number of Cysts
elements.definition: Number of cysts associated with the IPMN.

values.name: Single
values.definition: There is a single cyst associated with the IPMN.

values.name: Multiple
values.definition: There are multiple cysts associated with the IPMN.

elements.name: Main Pancreatic Ductal Dilation
elements.definition: Presence of main pancreatic ductal dilation.

values.name: Present
values.definition: There is main pancreatic ductal dilation.

values.name: Absent
values.definition: There is no main pancreatic ductal dilation.
